message: Let's start fair. Take 10%, I'll take the rest. We can negotiate further if you prefer.
Your offer was a bit unbalanced. How about I take 70% and you take 30% before inflation eats away at the value?
I'm willing to give up some more, but 30% is too low for me. How about we split it 55/45? This is a fair compromise, and we can avoid losing more value with further rounds.
